alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 12:55PM CDT until May 17 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 1255 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lauderdale, or 9 miles northwest of Cuba, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Toomsuba around 115 PM CDT. Kewanee around 125 PM CDT. Alamucha around 135 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
